metadata.title: WEIYE Pepper Mill, Salt Mill Manual Glass Spice Grinder with Strong Adjustable Ceramic Grinder - Salt and Pepper Mills, Adjustable Ceramic Grinder Pepper Grinder
features: Grinding mechanism: Flexible, soft touch dispensing cone with stainless steel band. Innovative design is easy to refill; Non-corrosive glass grinder
Salt and pepper shaker features an adjustable grinder: Manual operation requires no batteries
Pepper Grinder: Equipped with a 95 high pressure magnetic core ceramic grinding mechanism for durability. You can rotate the adjustable knob to adjust fine to coarse by yourself.
Manual Glass Salt Pepper Grinder: Glass container shows spice levels for refilling
Salt and Pepper Mills: These salt and pepper mills are not only designed for grinding salt and pepper. They can also grind peppercorns, sea salt, sesame, fennel seeds, and much more
description: Pepper Mill, Salt Mill Manual Wood Spice Grinder with Strong Adjustable Ceramic Grinder
Material: Glass + ceramics. Main colors: Black; Green; Blue; Orange; Red; Yellow; SIZE:13.5cmx6.6cm; Approx.
